channel.title: Haade
channel.description: Home Assistance Alsace home automation & electronics.

item.title: Testing the new Nodon SIN-4-FP-21 heating module
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
I will test this nodon pilot wire module and above all show you how to integrate and control it in home assistant with the thermostat interface

A new arrival on the market for radiator control by pilot wire, the Nodon SIN-4-FP-21, faithful to the manufacturing quality of the brand, promises simplified management of radiators with management by pilot wire.

Read the full article: Testing the new Nodon SIN-4-FP-21 heating module on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Nspanel Pro 3.0 Rubik Design Update
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Presentation of Rubik the new user interface of Nspanel Pro for a new experience takes areas of Rubik's cube.

Sonoff evolves the user interface (UI) of NSPanel Pro, version 3.0.0 integrates Rubik an interface module which opens up the fields of possibility for you. The company continues to upgrade the firmware of Zigbee modules, and this proves that this company is serious.

Read the full article: Nspanel Pro 3.0 Rubik Design Update on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Save on heating thanks to home automation, it works!
item.dc:creator: Nico
August
item.description:
As part of a new video concept presented by August on YouTube, I will detail the installation of a home gas boiler.

This is an article dedicated to the home automation of a traditional gas boiler with radiators connected to water circuits. Home automation will bring you comfort, financial savings and foolproof adaptability. This article is written to complement the video shot by August and Lulu on the subject. Two friends who [...]

Read the full article: Save on heating thanks to home automation, it works! on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Haade-lab Youtube channel by August
item.dc:creator: August
item.description:
Presentation of August and Lulu, new hosts of the Haade-Lab channel, presenting home automation tutorials and tests

I introduce myself August host of the Haade Channel on youtube, helped by Lulu we will feed the channel Haade-lab section by presenting tutorials and tests in home automation in a different and rather fun way. This channel is primarily dedicated to the general public. A novice in this field, [...]

Read the full article: Haade-lab Youtube channel by August on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Test Lixee Zlinky plug'n play teleinfo
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Test of the Zlinky module for the feedback of special linky teleinformation manufactured by Lixee and plug'n play, compatible with all opensource boxes

Actuellement il y a de nombreuses façons de relever la téléinformation, j’en ai déjà testé quelques unes, aujourd’hui je vais te parler du Lixee, je sais ce que tu te dit, il vient en retard ! d’autres l’ont déjà fait. Pour ma défense je ne possède pas de Linky, mais [...]

Read the full article: Test Lixee Zlinky plug'n play teleinfo on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Z-wave 800LR Silabs relaunches z-wave
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Since the acquisition of the manufacturing of Z-wave chips, and the significant progress on the market, Silabs is preparing to resuscitate Z-wave on the European market

Since the acquisition of the manufacturing of Z-wave chips, and the significant progress on the market, Silabs is preparing to resuscitate Z-wave on the European market. Last month I wrote an article on the end of Z-wave, where I explained that this protocol almost disappeared, especially in Europe because of [...]

Read the full article: Z-wave 800LR Silabs relaunches z-wave on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Sonoff zigbee SNZB-03P and SNZB-06P sensor tests
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
test of sonoff SNZB-03P and SNZB-06P zigbee movement and human presence sensors what differences, are they well recognized in our assistants.

As usual I thank Domadoo and itead for the loan of these two Sonoff Zigbee modules which are the SNZB-03P and SNZB-06P, these are two presence detection modules that are completely opposed, and yet quite similar. In this article I will test the operation and integration in Zigbee2mqtt and ZHA. [...]

Read the full article: Sonoff zigbee SNZB-03P and SNZB-06P sensor tests on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Z-wave dead and buried
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Since the arrival of the Zigbee protocol on the market, the Z-wave protocol seems to be at a standstill, let's take stock of this situation.

I admit, the title is a bit big, it is still a question of making an objective retrospective of this protocol which seems to disappear from the radars of European resellers. Since the arrival of Zigbee with its free protocol, prohibitive prices for Z-wave modules, and high battery consumption have [...]

Read the full article: Z-wave dead and buried on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Tests Aqara h1 switch and bindings
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
test the aqara h1 switch europe version with h1 remote control and initiation to the zigbee bindings connection

Today I am going to tell you about two Xiaomi Aqara products intended for the European market, These are the Aqara smart switch H1 double switch WS-EUK03 and the battery-powered switch Aqara H1 WXKG15LM (WRS-R02). According to Xiaomi, these are high-end switches and compatible with Binding, so are they up [...]

Read the full article: Tests Aqara h1 switch and bindings on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Box Home Assistant Green and Skyconnect test
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Test of the Home assistant Green box at $99 and the Skyconnect zigbee dongle at $29.99, stability, performance there

I am far from being the first to test this box, for the needs of an installation at Paulo’s, I ordered a Home Assistant Green Box and a Skyconnect key on seeedstudio, now it’s time to test this box and see if she is stable!

Read the full article: Box Home Assistant Green and Skyconnect test on the blog Haade.fr.
